document_data.mainbody:
century DR
X the Mystics Arcane Grimoire was a powerful spellbook written by "X the Mystic" that was discovered in the Tomb of the Nine Gods in Chult in the late 15 century DR.
It had its title burned into its binding.
The Arcane Grimoire was in the possession of the arcanaloth Ygga Raxyg in the sixth and final level of the Tomb of the Nine Gods.
The Arcane Grimoire had one to three extremely powerful spells, some of which could even equal Acereraks own magical powers.
